citation: Proclamation under the Primary Produce Safety Act 2011 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Primary Produce Safety Act 2011

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Primary Produce Safety Act 2011 fix 1 February 2015 as the day on which the following provisions of that Act commence:

        (a) sections 31, 87, 89, 90, 91, 92, 93, 94 and 95;
        (b) Schedules 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8.
22 December 2014

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 31 December 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
